product.cushioning: Plush and responsive CloudTec cushioning for a soft, bouncy feel.
product.breathability: Engineered mesh upper promotes excellent airflow.
product.short_description: Experience the next evolution of premium comfort with the On Men's Cloud 6 Sneakers. Building on the legacy of its celebrated predecessor, the Cloud 6 refines the perfect balance of plush cushioning and lightweight performance for the modern lifestyle. Engineered with a redesigned upper crafted from 100% recycled polyester, this shoe offers a sock-like fit that adapts seamlessly to your foot, providing enhanced flexibility and all-day wearability. The iconic CloudTec? pods in the midsole deliver that signature soft landing with every step, while the updated Zero-Gravity foam ensures a bouncy, responsive feel without any excess weight. Whether you're navigating a busy workday, exploring a new city, or simply enjoying a casual weekend, the Cloud 6 provides unparalleled underfoot comfort. The speed-lacing system allows for a quick, secure fit, while the reflective details add a layer of safety for low-light adventures. More than just a sneaker, the On Men's Cloud 6 is a statement of Swiss-engineered design, merging sustainable materials with cutting-edge technology to create a versatile shoe that performs as good as it looks. Discover the effortless comfort and modern style that has made the Cloud series a global phenomenon, perfect for the man who demands both function and fashion from his footwear.
product.about_this_item: Upper Same Cloud 6 look, now more functional than ever. The new mesh upper has improved durability and breathability, with a stronger abrasion resistance to take on daily wear. Midsole / outsole The midsole is 50% bio-attributed, reducing the bottom unit's CO2 footprint by 20%. An updated outsole features connected rubber pods for better traction, grip and durability. Speedboard The Speedboard is engineered for optimal all-day performance, torsional support and stability ? stable landings, soft toe-offs.
